text: The third-generation iPad Mini 3 (stylized and marketed as iPad mini 3) is a tablet computer that is made and sold by Apple Inc. It was started on October 22, 2014. It was discontinued on September 9, 2015 when the iPad Mini 4 was released. The iPad Mini 3 is the first iPad Mini to have a Touch ID fingerprint scanner that can be used a passcode to make sure nobody someone does not want to accesses their device. == Storage options == * 16 GB * 64 GB * 128 GB == References == Category:IPad Category:Tablets released in 2010s Category:Apple products released in 2014 Category:Apple hardware
title: IPad Mini 3
